description: This notification is sent when an alarm is raised.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmRaisedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 5 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmActiveManagedObjectInterpret s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmDescription s EXAMPLE ALARM-MIB::alarmModelIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmActiveManagedObjectInstance s EXAMPL

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object indicates how to interpret cienaCesAlarmActiveManagedObjectInstance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmActiveManagedObjectInterpret

description: This object indicates the description of the alarm.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmDescription

description: An integer that acts as an alarm Id
variables.name: ALARM-MIB::alarmModelIndex

description: This object indicates the unique index of the table.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmActiveManagedObjectInstance

description: This notification is sent when an alarm is cleared.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmClearedNotification CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity i 0 CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress x 000eaa12ddff CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmClearManagedObjectInterpret s EXAMPLE CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmDescription s EXAMPLE ALARM-MIB::alarmModelIndex u 1 CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmClearManagedObjectInstance s EXAMPL

description: This object defines the severity of a trap and is a part of every trap defined in the system.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalSeverity

description: This object indicates the chassis MAC address.
variables.name: CIENA-GLOBAL-MIB::cienaGlobalMacAddress

description: This object indicates how to interpret cienaCesAlarmClearManagedObjectInstance.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmClearManagedObjectInterpret

description: This object indicates the description of the alarm.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmDescription

description: An integer that acts as an alarm Id
variables.name: ALARM-MIB::alarmModelIndex

description: This object indicates the unique index of the table.
variables.name: CIENA-CES-ALARM-MIB::cienaCesAlarmClearManagedObjectInstance
